project.title: Jamstack Blog Template
project.subtitle: An official Gridsome Starter.
project.content: This is my boilerplate template for a Jamstack blog using Gridsome. I've incorporated buefy (a javascript layer for Bulma) for quick prototyping. I've also included Netlify CMS to allow non-coders to manage sites built with the template.
